title: Window + Door estimator
job_overview:
Seeking an experienced window + door estimator for a glazing company in Australia.

Previous experience in aluminium window, door glazing estimation required.
Experience in Logikal and Bluebeam
Required skills to read and interpret building plans, energy reports, specifications

Successful applicant will be responsible for sourcing supplier quotes on materials, doing take offs for glass, hardware and aluminium products.

Thank you, Lee.
Surefit Glass - Brisbane, Australia
